articles.title: Kim Jong Il Enjoys September Concert
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Enjoys September Concert
Pyongyang, September 8 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il together with servicepersons enjoyed a September concert given by the State Merited Chorus to mark the 62nd anniversary of the founding of the DPRK.
					 The concert began with the playing of the national anthem. Put on the stage were male chorus "Please Receive Our Salute", male vocal solo and male chorus "O. My Korea", male chorus "Do Prosper, Era of the Workers' Party", male duet and male chorus "It's Really Good Society" and "We Began from Scratch ", male choruses "Push back Frontiers of Latest Science", "Road of Victory" and "Appearance of Korea" and other colorful numbers.
					
					 Through their revolutionary and militant performance the performers sang with high pride of the shining path of victory and glory covered  under the banner of the DPRK, a powerful weapon for socialist construction and a cradle of the Korean people's happiness, and truthfully represented the firm faith and will, militant spirit and will of the army and people to devotedly defend the headquarters of the Korean revolution under the uplifted banner of the red flag of the revolution despite all sorts of trials and hardships and accomplish the revolutionary cause of Juche generation after generation under the leadership of the Party.
					
					 Kim Jong Il extended thanks to the artistes of the State Merited Chorus, expressing great satisfaction over the fact that they presented a splendid concert replete with the spirit of the DPRK, the revolutionary spirit of Mt. Paektu.
					
					 Noting that the chorus, a prestigious and dynamic art group, is a pride of the Korean people and precious asset of the country, he expressed expectation and conviction that the creators and artistes of the chorus would conduct more dynamic militant art creative activities to powerfully encourage the army and people in the sacred struggle for accomplishing the cause of building a great prosperous and powerful socialist nation.
					
					 Among the audience were Jang Song Thaek, vice-chairman of the NDC of the DPRK and department director of the WPK Central Committee, Department Directors Kim Kyong Hui and Thae Jong Su and other leading officials of the WPK Central Committee, KPA Generals Kim Myong Guk, Kim Won Hong and Hyon Chol Hae and commanding officers of the army and armed forces organs.

articles.title: National Meeting Marks 62nd DPRK's Birthday
articles.content:
National Meeting Marks 62nd DPRK's Birthday
 Pyongyang, September 8 (KCNA) -- A national meeting was held at the April 25 House of Culture on Wednesday to celebrate the 62nd founding anniversary of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea.
					 Present there were Kim Yong Nam and other senior party, army and state officials, the chairpersons of friendly parties, deputies to the Supreme People's Assembly, officials of party, armed forces and power organs, social organizations, ministries and national institutions, servicepersons of the Korean People's Army and the Korean People's Internal Security Forces, officials in the fields of science, education, culture and art, public health and media, bereaved families of revolutionary martyrs, labor innovators, working people in the city of Pyongyang, congratulatory groups, delegations and visiting groups of overseas compatriots and the chief of the Pyongyang Mission of the Anti-Imperialist National Democratic Front.
					
					 Diplomatic envoys of various countries, members of military attaches corps and representatives of international organizations here and delegations of different countries here were present there on invitation.
					
					 Premier Choe Yong Rim, alternate member of the Political Bureau of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, in a report at the meeting, said that the founding of the DPRK was a brilliant victory of President Kim Il Sung's Juche-oriented idea and line of nation-building and a historic event which brought about a fundamental turn in carving out the destinies of the country and the people and carrying out the revolutionary cause of Juche.
					
					 He went on:
					
					 The founding of the DPRK enabled the Korean people to become powerful and dignified masters of the state sovereignty who carve out their destiny independently with a firm grip on it for the first time in history and made it possible for the DPRK to emerge a full-fledged independent and sovereign state on the international arena to powerfully demonstrate the honor and might of Juche Korea.
					
					 The President wisely led the drive to develop the DPRK into a genuine country centered on the popular masses and an independent socialist state which fully embodied the Juche idea.
					
					Today the DPRK has greeted the golden age of its development, demonstrating the invincible might under General Secretary Kim Jong Il's energetic leadership of patriotic devotion.
					
					 Kim Jong Il has developed the DPRK into a state of the President both in name and reality and increased the national capacity in every way upholding the banner of Songun to reliably defend Korean-style socialism.
					
					 By embodying the noble patriotic idea of Kim Jong Il and the independent foreign policy of the Workers' Party of Korea, the DPRK ushered in an epochal phase in achieving the independent reunification under the banner of the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration, further raised its international prestige and status and remarkably strengthened the international solidarity with the Korean revolution.
					
					 The reporter called upon all the people to hold Kim Il Sung in high esteem as the eternal President of the DPRK for all ages and carry out the revolution and construction as intended by the President and the way he did under any circumstances, thus adding shine to the DPRK forever as a glorious state of the President.
					
					 Steadfast is the stand of the DPRK to improve the inter-Korean relations on the basis of the historic June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration and pave the way for the national reunification, he said, and went on:
					
					 If the enemy ignites a war of aggression despite the repeated warnings of the army and people of the DPRK and the protest of the international community, they will tap all the military potentials including the self-defensive nuclear deterrent which they have built under the banner of Songun to blow up the stronghold of the aggressors and build a reunified thriving nation on this land.
					
					 The DPRK government will boost the good-neighborly and friendly relations with other countries and vigorously struggle for the global independence under the uplifted banner of independence, peace and friendship.

articles.title: Cuban President Celebrates DPRK's Birthday
articles.content:
Cuban President Celebrates DPRK's Birthday
 Pyongyang, September 8 (KCNA) -- Raul Castro Ruz, president of the Council of State and president of the Council of Ministers of Cuba, sent a basket of flowers to the DPRK embassy in Havana on Sept. 3 in congratulation of the 62nd anniversary of the DPRK.
					 Cuban Foreign Minister Bruno Rodriguez Parrilla, too, sent a floral basket to the embassy on the same day.

articles.title: Gift from IIJI Director-General
articles.content:
Gift from IIJI Director-General
Pyongyang, September 8 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il was presented with a gift by Vishwanath, secretary-general of the International Kim Il Sung Prize Council and director-general of the International Institute of the Juche Idea, on the occasion of the 62nd birthday of the DPRK.
					 The gift was handed over to an official concerned by the director-general on a visit to the DPRK on Wednesday.

articles.title: Congratulatory Letter from Military Attaches
articles.content:
Congratulatory Letter from Military Attaches
 Pyongyang, September 8 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il received a floral basket and a congratulatory letter from the military attaches corps here on the occasion of the 62nd birthday of the DPRK.
					 The basket and letter were conveyed to an official concerned by Sun Yanfeng, Chinese military, naval and air attache who is doyen of the corps, on Wednesday.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung's Feat in State Building
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung's Feat in State Building
 Pyongyang, September 8 (KCNA) -- Sixty-two years has elapsed since the founding of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea.
					 The Korean people, including the servicepersons, are looking back upon the history of the Republic, which has emerged victorious under the guidance of the Workers' Party of Korea and the leader.
					
					 President Kim Il Sung founded the famous Juche idea and indicated the way the Korean revolution should advance along. He, regarding revolutionary armed forces as a powerful means for shaping the destiny of the nation and people, brought the anti-Japanese armed struggle to victory and accomplished the historical cause of national liberation to open up a new era of independence and prosperity of the nation.
					
					 He, basing himself on the unique policy for the building of a revolutionary government he put forward during the anti-Japanese revolutionary struggle and on rich experience he gained in its implementation, wisely guided the effort to establish a unified democratic and sovereign state reflecting unanimous desire of the entire Korean people and proclaimed the founding of the DPRK on September 9, Juche 37 (1948).
					
					 The founding of the Republic, which was a splendid result of his Juche-oriented idea and policy for state building and his energetic leadership to carry them into practice, marked a historical event of weighty significance in hewing out the nation's destiny and carrying out the revolutionary cause of Juche.
					
					Since the event, the Korean people have become the masters of the state and society and independent and creative human beings carving out their own destiny by themselves for the first time in the 5,000-year-old history of the country, provided with a powerful political weapon for the prosperity of the nation and solid foundations for the revolutionary cause of Juche, the cause of socialism.
					
					 A bright prospect has also been opened up for the cause of global independence.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam Congratulates Indonesian President
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam Congratulates Indonesian President
Pyongyang, September 8 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, Tuesday sent a congratulatory message to Susilo Bambang Yudhoyono, Indonesian President, on the occasion of his 61st birthday.
					 Kim in the message sincerely wished him good health and greater success in his work for the prosperity of the country and welfare of the people and expressed the belief that the friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries would continue to expand and develop.

articles.title: End to US Occupation of S. Korea Demanded
articles.content:
End to US Occupation of S. Korea Demanded
Pyongyang, September 8 (KCNA) -- A spokesman for the Central Committee of the Democratic Front for the Reunification of Korea issued a statement on Wednesday, 65 years since the U.S. illegally occupied south Korea.
					 The U.S. was the arch criminal who divided Korea into the north and the south, bringing misfortune and pain to the Korean nation and it is the root cause of aggression and war, the statement said, and went on:
					
					 The U.S. reckless moves for aggression and war against the DPRK have entered a very dangerous phase.
					
					 The U.S. presence in south Korea and its domination and moves for a war of aggression are encouraged by the Lee Myung Bak group of traitors.
					
					 The Central Committee of the Democratic Front for the Reunification of Korea bitterly denounces together with the whole nation the U.S. for having inflicted unspeakable misfortune and sufferings on the Korean nation for the past 65 years after occupying south Korea and the Lee Myung Bak group of traitors for prolonging its remaining days through sycophancy toward the U.S. and treachery and laying a stumbling block in the way of achieving peace and reunification in utter disregard of the dignity and interests of the nation. 
					
					  Neither peace and reunification of the Korean Peninsula nor peace and security in Northeast Asia are thinkable as long as the U.S. forces are present in south Korea.
					
					 The U.S. should properly understand the mounting anti-U.S. sentiment of the Koreans, withdraw its aggression forces from south Korea, discontinue the moves for a war of aggression against the DPRK and refrain from any acts obstructive to the independent and peaceful reunification of Korea.
					
					 The statement called upon all parties and groups and people from all walks of life in south Korea to drive the U.S. imperialist aggression forces out of south Korea, shatter the U.S. moves for escalating confrontation with the DPRK and war moves and turn out as one in the sacred anti-U.S. patriotic struggle to throw overboard the pro-U.S. sycophants and lackeys.

articles.title: National Memorial Service for Kang Kon Held
articles.content:
National Memorial Service for Kang Kon Held
 Pyongyang, September 8 (KCNA) -- A national memorial service for revolutionary fighter Kang Kon was held at the Central Youth Hall Wednesday to commemorate the 60th anniversary of his death.
					 Attending the service were senior party, army and state officials, the chairperson of a friendly party, officials of party, armed forces and power organs, public organizations, ministries and national institutions, service persons of the Korean People's Army and the Korean People's Internal Security Forces, officials of scientific, educational, cultural and art, public health and media institutions, bereaved families of revolutionary martyrs and working people in the city.
					
					 Kang Kon was an indomitable revolutionary who devoted everything to the struggle for the victory of the revolutionary cause of Juche with arms, single-mindedly remaining true to the leadership of President Kim Il Sung. 
					
					 Born into a poor peasant family in Sangju County, North Kyongsang Province, he embarked upon the road of revolution at his early age. 
					
					 After joining the Anti-Japanese People's Guerrilla Army in April of Juche 22 (1933) he became a member of the party organization thanks to the deep trust and particularly profound loving care of the President. He was active as a platoon leader, a company political commissar, a regiment political commissar and a political commissar of a detachment. 
					
					 He held important posts of chief of Camp No. 2 of the Security Officers Training Centre, vice-minister of National Defence and concurrently chief of the General Staff of the Korean People's Army in the period of building a new country. He made a great contribution to the victory in the hard-fought Fatherland Liberation War as chief of the general staff of the command of the front. 
					
					 He fell in action at the age of 32 on Sept. 8, 1950 while commanding an offensive operation of KPA units to wipe out the U.S. imperialist aggressors. 
					
					 The President made sure that the title of Hero of the Republic was awarded to Kang and the First Central Military Academy was named after him.  In his reminiscences the President highly appreciated Kang's life and feats, noting that Kang dedicated even his last drop of blood to the revolution and performed great exploits in the field of building the people's armed forces. 
					
					 The President saw to it that his bust and statue were erected at the Revolutionary Martyrs Cemetery on Mt. Taesong and in Sariwon City, North Hwanghae Province respectively and urged the army and people of the DPRK to learn from his loyalty and steadfast revolutionary principle. 
					
					 KPA General Ri Yong Ho, chief of the General Staff of the KPA, in his memorial address said that short as Kang's life was, it was a worthwhile one through which he taught in practice how a true revolutionary, an ardent patriot should hold the leader in high esteem and how one should live and struggle for the country and its people. 
					
					He called upon all the party members and other working people to cherish the loyalty to the party and the leader as revolutionary faith and obligation like the anti-Japanese revolutionary forerunners, defend the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea headed by General Secretary Kim Jong Il with their lives and consolidate as firm as a rock the single-minded unity of all the service persons and people united close around the headquarters of the revolution.

articles.title: Wreaths Laid before Bust of Kang Kon
articles.content:
Wreaths Laid before Bust of Kang Kon
 Pyongyang, September 8 (KCNA) -- Wreaths were placed before the bust of revolutionary martyr Kang Kon at the Revolutionary Martyrs Cemetery on Mt. Taesong Wednesday on the occasion of the 60th anniversary of his death.
					Seen before the bust was a wreath sent by General Secretary Kim Jong Il.
					
					 Present at the wreath-laying ceremony were Ri Yong Ho, Yang Hyong Sop, officials of the party and armed forces organs, ministries and national institutions, servicepersons of the KPA, bereaved families and officials and working people in the city.
					
					 Placed were wreaths in the name of the C.C., the WPK, the Ministry of the People's Armed Forces, the Ministry of Railways, the Sericulture and Silk Fabrics Guidance Bureau, party and power bodies in Pyongyang and others.
					
					 The participants paid silent tribute to Kang Kon who performed special feats in the history of building the army of Juche.

articles.title: Korean Students in Japan Meet Unconverted Long-term Prisoner
articles.content:
Korean Students in Japan Meet Unconverted Long-term Prisoner
 Pyongyang, September 8 (KCNA) -- The delegation of the Korean Students Union in Japan led by Mun Si Hong, vice-chairman of the union, staying in the socialist homeland met with Choe Thae Guk, former unconverted long-term prisoner, on Wednesday.
					 Choe said that he could remain true to his revolutionary principle despite enemies' severe punishment and appeasement and deception in hell-like south Korean prison for decades because he cherished absolute trust in the Party and leader.
					
					Recalling that General Secretary Kim Jong Il bestowed upon him the honor of being a pro-reunification patriotic fighter and hero of the Republic though he did just what he should do as his soldier, Choe said in an excited tone that Kim Jong Il is indeed the benevolent father of all Koreans.
					
					 He urged the members of the delegation to prepare as reliable officials of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan who steadfastly carry forward the tradition of patriotism, remaining true to the Songun leadership of Kim Jong Il, the illustrious commander of Mt. Paektu.
					
					 Then there was an art performance given by the members of the delegation.

articles.title: Services Recorded in History of DPRK-China Friendship
articles.content:
Services Recorded in History of DPRK-China Friendship
Pyongyang, September 8 (KCNA) -- Great deeds and noble internationalist spirit of the Chinese People's Volunteers in the Fatherland Liberation War (June 1950-July 1953) are still kept in the memory of the Korean people.
					When the Democratic People's Republic of Korea was in the war started by the U.S. imperialists, the Chinese Party and Government dispatched many volunteers to the Korean front under the banner of resisting America and aiding Korea, safeguarding the home and defending the motherland. 
					
					The Chinese volunteers fought shoulder to shoulder with the Korean soldiers in the same trench, fully displaying a self-sacrificing spirit and collective heroism.
					
					Huang Ji Guang said, "The enemy's bullets may take my life, but not dear Koreans'", before covering the enemy's gun muzzle with his body. Xu Jia Peng, too, rushed forward, shouting "Forward for Korea, our neighbor!" to silence an enemy machinegun with his body and make a breakthrough for his unit's advance. 
					
					Three volunteers on Sanggam Pass fought as many troops as a battalion and defended the height for three days under a rain of shells and bombs.
					
					Although they had many difficulties in the war, the Chinese volunteers helped peasants with their plowing, sowing and harvesting, repaired reservoirs, dams, roads and bridges and protected lives and properties of Korean people.
					
					Luo Sheng Jiao is well known in Korea as he saved a boy from a frozen river at the cost of his life.
					
					Indeed, the Korean War is a witness to friendship and cooperation fully demonstrated by the armies and people of the two countries.
					
					The great services of the Chinese People's Volunteers are shining along with the DPRK-China friendship ever developing under deep care of the leaders of the two countries.

articles.title: US Occupation of S. Korea under Fire
articles.content:
US Occupation of S. Korea under Fire
 Pyongyang, September 8 (KCNA) -- The U.S. imperialist aggression forces' occupation of south Korea is a source of escalated tension and danger of nuclear war on the Korean Peninsula.
					 Rodong Sinmun Wednesday says this in a singed article.
					
					 The article points out that the history of the U.S. occupation of south Korea is that of heinous crimes as the U.S. has disturbed peace of the peninsula and seriously threatened security of the Korean nation through ceaseless moves for aggression on the DPRK.
					
					 The U.S. imperialist aggression forces' presence in south Korea serves as source of the danger whereby a new war may break out on the peninsula, it says, and goes on:
					
					 After the Korean War the U.S. shipped huge military equipment, including nukes, and troops into south Korea and set up aggression military bases in many parts of it. Consequently, south Korea has turned into the largest nuclear powder magazine in the Far East and the forward base for aggression on the DPRK.
					
					 The U.S. has persisted in its reckless scheme to retrieve its defeat in the Korean War and realize its ambition for invasion of the DPRK, thus bringing the constant danger of war to the peninsula and posing a grave threat to its peace.
					
					 The U.S. still remains unchanged in its design to keep its military presence in south Korea and carry out its policy of aggression on the DPRK. It is persistently keeping tens of thousands of its aggression troops in south Korea, refusing to withdraw them. It is clear to everyone that such action is intended to provoke a war of aggression on the peninsula at any cost.
					
					 It is anachronistic that the U.S. has kept its military presence in south Korea up to now though many years have passed since the end of the Cold War. There is no ground for the U.S. imperialist aggression forces to be stationed in south Korea any longer.
					
					 The U.S. imperialist aggression forces should be withdrawn from south Korea at once in order to prevent the danger of outbreak of a new war and ensure peace and security on the peninsula.

articles.title: Withdrawal of US Forces from S. Korea Called for
articles.content:
Withdrawal of US Forces from S. Korea Called for
Pyongyang, September 8 (KCNA) -- Tensions constantly run high on the Korean Peninsula entirely due to the U.S. imperialists' occupation of south Korea and their policy of aggression.
					 Rodong Sinmun Wednesday says this in a signed article.
					
					 Citing facts to prove that the Korean people have been subject to tragedy and disgrace of national division for more than half a century owing to the U.S. imperialists' presence in south Korea, the article goes on:
					
					 The U.S. forces present in south Korea are the leftovers of the Cold War. The U.S., however, far from pulling them out of south Korea, has intensified the military presence and domination over it and frantically pursued the policy of stifling the DPRK by relying on those forces. This is completely unjustifiable. 
					
					 The pullback of foreign forces has become an international trend at present and growing stronger as never before are the world voices calling for the respect for the sovereignty and the territorial integrity of countries and nations. The U.S. moves to maintain and intensify its forces' presence in south Korea, quite contrary to the trend of the times, clearly prove that it remains unchanged in its wild ambition of aggression.
					
					 The U.S. forces present in south Korea are the hotbed of a war on the Korean Peninsula and a root cause of threatening and destroying the peace and security in Northeast Asia and, furthermore, the rest of the world. The pullback of the U.S. forces from south Korea would provide decisively favorable conditions for the peace and security in the Korean Peninsula and Northeast Asia.
					
					 The U.S. forces, a cancer-like entity, should be withdrawn from south Korea at an early date for the peace and security in the Korean Peninsula which are directly related to the peace and security of the rest of Northeast Asia and other parts of the world.
					
					 The U.S. should no longer insist on the anachronistic policy of its forces' presence in south Korea and its hostile policy towards the DPRK but make an earliest switchover in its policy. This serves as a touchstone judging whether it is willing to ensure the peace on the Korean Peninsula and improve the DPRK-U.S. relations.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Work Off Press in Russia
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Work Off Press in Russia
Pyongyang, September 8 (KCNA) -- The Nakhodka Format Publishing House of Russia brought out in pamphlet General Secretary Kim Jong Il's work "The Democratic People's Republic of Korea Is a Socialist State of Juche with Invincible Might" on the occasion of the 62nd birthday of the DPRK.
					 The work, published on Sept. 5, Juche 97 (2008), stresses that the 60-year long history of the DPRK is a great history of struggle and victory, creation and change in which the Korean people have defended the independence and honor of the country and built the prosperous and powerful socialist state, braving the tempest of revolution under the guidance of the great leader and the great party. Expounded in it is the idea that even a small and backward country can turn into a developed and dignified power when it is guided by the great leader and the great party. 
					
					 It also indicates the tasks and ways for accomplishing the revolutionary cause of Juche under the uplifted banner of the Juche idea, the banner of Songun.

articles.title: Japan Urged to Make Apology for Past Crimes
articles.content:
Japan Urged to Make Apology for Past Crimes
 Pyongyang, September 8 (KCNA) -- The Switzerland-Korea Committee and the Swiss Group for the Study of the Juche Idea made public a joint statement on Aug. 29 as regards the lapse of the centenary since the fabrication of the "Korea-Japan Annexation Treaty" by the Japanese imperialists. 
					 Bringing to light how the treaty was fabricated and its illegality, the statement held that the annexation of Korea was state terrorism and criminal gangsterism conducted by Japan in a bid to subordinate an independent nation to it.
					
					 Disclosing in detail that the Japanese imperialist aggressors had enforced a brutal and bloody colonial rule after occupying Korea, it said:
					
					 The statement, issued by the Japanese prime minister on the occasion of the centenary of the enforcement of "Korea-Japan annexation", is of no value as it did not mention an apology and reparation to the DPRK. 
					
					 Japan should make apology and reparation to the DPRK for its past crimes and return all cultural artifacts it plundered.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il presencia la funcion artistica de Unidad 963 del EPC
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il presencia la funcion artistica de Unidad 963 del EPC
Pyongyang, 8 de septiembre (ATCC) -- El Dirigente Kim Jong Il, Secretario General del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea, presencio la funcion del grupo de propaganda artistica de la Unidad 963 del EPC junto con los oficiales y soldados de este ejercito.
					 En la escena se presentaron las piezas de distintos generos, entre otras, el coro mixto "Que reciba saludo", el solo femenino "Oh, Partido madre" y el quinteto femenino "El partido es el regazo del General".
					
					 Mediante el espectaculo en que palpita el espiritu revolucionario de los militares, los ejecutantes mostraron bien el invencible poderio del EPC formado como ejercito sin rival en el regazo del gran comandante insigne, la ferrea conviccion y voluntad de los militares del EPC de defender a costa de la vida la Direccion de la Revolucion y llevar a feliz termino con las armas la causa revolucionaria del Juche siguiendo siempre al partido.
					
					  Muy satisfecho de que los miembros del grupo de propaganda artistica hayan ofrecido esta excelente funcion de alto nivel ideo-artistico con las obras originales que reflejan vividamente el noble mundo espiritual del ejercito coreano, el Dirigente dio agradecimiento a los creadores y artistas apreciando sus exitos alcanzados en la ocasion.
					
					  Elogio altamente el modo de lucha revolucionario de ellos diciendo que sus combativas actividades de propaganda artistica, que se adecuan con su condicion de artistas del ejercito revolucionario, inspiran en los militares el optimismo e invencible fe en la victoria, la disposicion y el coraje para exterminar a los enemigos.
					
					  La propaganda artistica deviene uno de los medios poderosos para la educacion de los militares, dijo y presento las tareas programaticas que serviran de guia en dinamizar las actividades de propaganda artistica conforme a la demanda de la epoca del Songun.   
					
					  El Dirigente estuvo acompanado en esta ocasion por el vicepresidente del CDN de la RPDC y jefe de departamento del CC del PTC Jang Song Thaek, los secretarios del CC del PTC Choe Thae Bok y Kim Ki Nam y otros cuadros directivos del CC del partido, los miembros de mando del ejercito y los organos de las fuerzas armadas.

articles.title: Acto central por 62o aniversario de la fundacion de la RPDC
articles.content:
Acto central por 62o aniversario de la fundacion de la RPDC
Pyongyang, 8 de septiembre (ATCC) -- Tuvo lugar el dia 8 en la capitalina Casa Cultural 25 de Abril el acto central por el 62o aniversario de la fundacion de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea.
					Asistieron aqui Kim Yong Nam y otros cuadros del partido, el ejercito y el Estado, los presidentes de partidos amigos, los diputados a la Asamblea Popular Suprema, los funcionarios de los organismos del partido, las fuerzas armadas y el Poder, los de entidades sociales, ministerios y organos centrales, los oficiales y soldados del EPC y de las Fuerzas Populares del Interior de Corea, los funcionarios de ramas de ciencia, educacion, cultura y arte, salud publica, prensa e informacion, los familiares de martires revolucionarios, los benemeritos laborales, los trabajadores capitalinos, los grupos de felicitacion, delegaciones y grupos de visita de los compatriotas en ultramar y el representante de la sucursal del Frente Democratico Nacional Antiimperialista en Pyongyang.
					
					Fueron invitados los representantes diplomaticas de varios paises, los miembros del Cuerpo de Agregados Militares y los delegados de las organizaciones internacionales, acreditados en Corea. 
					
					El informe de la ocasion estuvo a cargo del miembro suplente del Buro Politico del Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y primer ministro del Consejo de Ministros, Choe Yong Rim.
					
					La fundacion de la RPDC fue el brillante triunfo de la idea y lineas autoctonas del Presidente
						 Kim Il Sung en materia de la construccion del Estado y un evento historico que trajo un cambio radical en la forja del destino de nuestra patria y pueblo y en el cumplimiento de la causa revolucionaria del Juche senalo el informante y prosiguio:
					
					Gracias a la fundacion de la RPDC, el pueblo coreano se hizo el pueblo poderoso y prestigioso que por primera vez en la historia tomo el poder estatal en sus manos y forja de manera independiente su destino, y nuestro pais emergio en la arena internacional como un digno Estado independiente y soberano manifestando plenamente el honor y el impetu de la Corea del Juche. 
					
					El Presidente Kim Il Sung organizo y dirigio sabiamente la lucha por fortalecer a la RPDC como el Estado socialista independiente y verdadero pais centrado en las masas populares donde se materializara globalmente la idea Juche.
					
					Hoy en dia, la RPDC acoge la era de plena prosperidad de su desarrollo exaltando su invencible poderio bajo la energica guia del Dirigente         Kim Jong Il, caracterizada por el patriotismo y abnegacion.
					
					El ha convertido la RPDC en el Estado del Presidente Kim Il Sung y defendido firmemente el socialismo coreano al consolidar por todos los medios el poderio estatal bajo la bandera del Songun.
					
					Al materializar el noble ideal de amor por la patria y la nacion del Dirigente y la politica exterior independiente del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, la RPDC abrio la coyuntura trascendental para la reunificacion independiente del pais bajo la bandera de la Declaracion Conjunta del 15 de Junio y la Declaracion del 4 de Octubre, elevo mas su autoridad y posicion en la arena internacional y consolido considerablemente la solidaridad internacional con la revolucion coreana.
					
					Todo el pueblo debe enaltecer de siglo en siglo a Kim Il Sung como eterno Presidente de la RPDC e impulsar la revolucion y la construccion segun su proposito y su modo de trabajo para glorificarla eternamente como glorioso Estado del Presidente.
					
					Es invariable la posicion de la RPDC de mejorar las relaciones entre ambas partes coreanas y abrir el camino de la reunificacion de la patria a base de la historica Declaracion Conjunta del 15 de Junio y la Declaracion del 4 de Octubre. 
					
					Si los enemigos desatan la guerra de agresion pese a las reiteradas advertencias de nuestro ejercito y pueblo y al rechazo de la sociedad internacional, dinamitaremos por completo el baluarte de los invasores movilizando todas las potencialidades militares incluso el disuasivo nuclear de autodefensa fortalecidas bajo la bandera del Songun, y levantaremos sobre este territorio patrio una gran potencia prospera reunificada.
					
					 El gobierno de la RPDC luchara dinamicamente por desarrollar bajo la bandera de la independencia, la paz y la amistad las relaciones de buena vecindad entre los paises y por verificar la independencia en el mundo entero.

articles.title: FDRP demanda poner fin a la ocupacion del suelo surcoreano
articles.content:
FDRP demanda poner fin a la ocupacion del suelo surcoreano
Pyongyang, 8 de septiembre (ATCC) -- En relacion con el 65o aniversario de la ilegal ocupacion norteamericana del Sur de Corea, el portavoz del Comite Central del Frente Democratico para la Reunificacion de la Patria (FDRP) hizo publica el dia 8 una declaracion.
					 EE.UU. es el autor, que dividio en dos partes la nacion coreana y le impuso indecibles desgracias y sufrimientos, y el promotor de la agresion y la guerra.
					
					  Hoy, las imprudentes maniobras belicas de EE.UU. sobre la Peninsula Coreana llegan a la etapa extremadamente peligrosa.
					
					  Los tejemanejes de EE.UU. para la ocupacion y dominio sobre el Sur de Corea y para la guerra de agresion se promueven mas por la banda traidora de Lee Myung Bak.
					
					  El CC del FDRP condena severamente junto con toda la nacion coreana a esa camarilla que se mantiene del servilismo vendepatria a EE.UU., que impuso incontables desgracias y sufrimientos a la nacion coreana ocupando el Sur de Corea durante 65 anos pasados, y obstaculiza la paz y la reunificacion pisoteando la dignidad y los intereses de la nacion.
					
					  Mientras que las tropas norteamericanas permanezcan en el Sur de Corea, no se puede pensar en la paz y la reunificacion de la Peninsula Coreana  ni en la paz y la seguridad del Nordeste Asiatico.
					
					  EE.UU. debe ver correctamente el gran animo antiyanqui del pueblo coreano, retirar a sus tropas agresoras del Sur de Corea, abandonar sus maniobras de agresion a la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y dejar de estropear la reunificacion independiente y pacifica de Corea.
					
					  Finalmente, la declaracion llama a todos los partidos, fracciones y habitantes de distintos sectores del Sur de Corea a levantarse en la sagrada lucha patriotica antiyanqui por expulsar a las tropas agresoras norteamericanas del territorio surcoreano, frustrar las maniobras de enfrentamiento y guerra de EE.UU. contra la RPDC y eliminar la banda de traidores serviles a EE.UU.

articles.title: Acto por 60o aniversario de fallecimiento de Kang Kon
articles.content:
Acto por 60o aniversario de fallecimiento de Kang Kon
Pyongyang, 8 de septiembre (ATCC) -- Tuvo lugar el dia 8 en la Casa Central de la Juventud el acto central de recordacion del combatiente revolucionario Kang Kon por el 60o aniversario de su fallecimiento.
					Participaron en la ocasion los cuadros del Partido, el ejercito y el Estado, el presidente de partido amigo, los funcionarios de los organismos del partido, las fuerzas armadas y el poder, las entidades sociales, los ministerios y los organos centrales, los oficiales y soldados del Ejercito Popular de Corea y de las Fuerzas Populares del Interior de Corea, los funcionarios de sectores de ciencia, educacion, cultura y arte, salud publica, prensa e informacion, los familiares de los martires revolucionarios y los trabajadores capitalinos. 
					
					Kang Kon fue indoblegable revolucionario quien dedico siempre todo lo suyo para alcanzar con las armas la victoria de la causa revolucionaria del Juche bajo la direccion del Presidente Kim Il Sung.
					
					Nacido en una pobre familia campesina del distrito de Sangju de la provincia de Kyongsang del Norte, emprendio a su tierna edad el camino de la revolucion. Al ingresar en abril del 22 (1933) de la Era Juche en la Guerrilla Popular Antijaponesa, crecio bajo la profunda confianza y atencion especial del Presidente como miembro de la organizacion del partido y trabajo de jefe de peloton, instructor politico de compania, comisario politico de regimiento y de destacamento independiente.
					
					En el periodo de la construccion de la nueva patria, fue nombrado como jefe del Segundo Campamento del Centro de Entrenamiento de Cuadros de Seguridad, viceministro de Defensa Nacional y jefe del Estado Mayor General del EPC. 
					
					En los dias de la enconada Guerra de Liberacion de la Patria (1950-1953),  hizo gran aporte al triunfo de la guerra fungiendo como jefe del Estado Mayor de la Comandancia del Frente.
					
					Cayo en el combate el 8 de septiembre de 1950 a los 32 anos de edad cuando comandaba una operacion de ofensiva de las unidades del EPC contra los invasores yanquis.
					
					El Presidente dio la indicacion de otorgar a el el titulo de Heroe de la Republica y denominar con su nombre la Escuela Central de Oficiales no.1. Y aprecio mucho la vida y hazanas de lucha de Kang Kon al escribir en sus memorias que el dedico a la revolucion hasta la ultima gota de sangre y contribuyo mucho a la construccion de las fuerzas armadas populares. 
					
					El Dirigente Kim Jong Il hizo edificar el busto y estatua de bronce de Kang Kon en el Cementerio de Martires Revolucionarios en el Monte Taesong y en la ciudad de Sariwon de la provincia de Hwanghae del Norte, respectivamente, e instruyo a todos los militares y civiles coreanos aprender su fidelidad y principio revolucionario.
					
					 El general de ejercito del EPC, Ri Yong Ho, quien es jefe del Estado Mayor General del EPC, dijo en su discurso de la ocasion que aunque no fue larga, la vida de Kang Kon fue la valiosa que mostro como un verdadero revolucionario y un patriota fervoroso deben apoyar a su lider, vivir y luchar por la patria y el pueblo. 
					
					Todos los militantes del partido y los trabajadores deben guardar la fidelidad al partido y al lider como conviccion y obligacion revolucionarias, como los martires revolucionarios antijaponeses, defender a riesgo de la vida el Comite Central del PTC encabezado por el Dirigente Kim Jong Il y consolidar firmemente la unidad monolitica entre todos los militares y civiles en torno a la Direccion de la Revolucion, enfatizo.

articles.title: Ocupacion norteamericana del Sur de Corea es la causa de guerra nuclear
articles.content:
Ocupacion norteamericana del Sur de Corea es la causa de guerra nuclear
Pyongyang, 8 de septiembre (ATCC) -- La ocupacion del territorio surcoreano por parte de las tropas yanquis es la causa de agravacion de la tension y de guerra nuclear. 
					Senala asi el diario Rodong Sinmun en un articulo individual divulgado este miercoles y prosigue:
					
					La trayectoria de tal ocupacion es la historia llena de crimenes en que el imperio vino perturbando la paz de la Peninsula Coreana y amenazando gravemente la seguridad de la nacion coreana con sus incesantes maniobras agresivas contra la RPDC.
					
					Despues de la pasada guerra coreana, EE.UU. introdujo en el suelo surcoreano una enorme cantidad de equipos de guerra incluso las armas nucleares e incontables efectivos e instalo por doquier sus bases militares agresivas. De esta manera, el suelo surcoreano se ha convertido en el mayor artesanal nuclear del Extremo Oriente y base avanzada para la agresion al Norte de Corea. 
					
					No pararon nunca las imprudentes maniobras de EE.UU. tendentes a desquitarse de su derrota en la pasada guerra coreana y a realizar a toda costa su ambicion de agredir a la RPDC. Por esta razon, la Peninsula Coreana corre en todo momento el riesgo de nueva guerra y se ve seriamente amenazada la paz.
					
					Sigue siendo invariable la ambicion de EE.UU. de perpetuar la ocupacion del Sur de Corea para poner en practica su politica de agresion a Corea. 
					
					En este contexto, rehusa evacuar del Sur de Corea a decenas de miles de sus efectivos agresores a pesar de que paso mucho tiempo desde el fin de la Guerra Fria y no tiene ningun motivo de mantenerlos en esa parte de la Peninsula Coreana.
					
					 Para prevenir el estallido de la nueva guerra y preservar la paz y la seguridad en la Peninsula Coreana, es preciso sacar inmediatamente a las tropas agresoras norteamericanas del territorio surcoreano.
